summary: This bill, the "Technical Correction to the Shoshone-Paiute Tribes of the Duck Valley Reservation Water Rights Settlement Act of 2025," introduced in the Senate, aims to amend the Omnibus Public Land Management Act of 2009. It focuses on making a technical correction to the water rights settlement for the Shoshone-Paiute Tribes. Specifically, it involves authorizing an appropriation for the Development Fund, allowing for adjusted interest payments.
